greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Apply the triangle-to-triangle transformation described in the Comments in A159041 to the triangle in A142258.
formula: A triangle of polynomial coefficients: p(x,n)=Sum[x^i*If[i == Floor[n/2] && Mod[n, 2] == 0, 0, If[i <= (less than or equal to) Floor[n/2], (-1)^i*A142458[n+1, i+1], -(-1)^(n - i)*A142458[n+1, i+1]]], {i, 0, n}]/(1 - x).
mathematica: Sum[x^i*If[i == Floor[n/2] && Mod[n, 2] == 0, 0, If[i <= Floor[n/2], (-1)^i*a[[n + 1, i + 1]], -(-1)^(n - i)*a[[n + 1, i + 1]]]], {i, 0, n}]/(1 - x);Flatten[Table[CoefficientList[FullSimplify[p[x, n]], x], {n, 1, 10}]]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, May 07 2013
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 11 2013
